Title: Boomers, Xers, and Other Strangers.
Subtitle: Understanding the Generational Differences that Divide Us.
Authors: Rick Hicks;Kathy Hicks.
Categories: Social Science.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=IogMAAAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: The authors maintain that children's core values are greatly shaped by what is going on in their culture when they are ten years old--and they show parents how to achieve reconciliation and improve communication between generations..
